home_list_msg: Below are the reminders you created:
home_no_data_msg:
Seems you don't have any reminder yet
Tap '+' to create new reminder to remind you to take medicine
reminder_new1_msg: Please select which medicine you will take & press 'Next'
reminder_new1_snackmsg1: Please select at least one medicine first
reminder_new2_msg: Please set the time to remind you & press 'Next'
reminder_new2_settimer_expired: At least 1 alarm is expired already. Please check again!
reminder_detail_confirmquestion: Are you sure to save this reminder?
reminder_detail_cancelquestion: Are you sure to cancel this reminder?
reminder_detail_deletequestion: Are you sure to delete this reminder?
reminder_detail_expiredDelquestion:
Reminder is expired
Do you want to delete?
reminder_detail_notice: Remember to follow doctor's instructions to take the proper quantity of medicine every time
display_list_msg: Please set the size of the app text:
oss_msg: This application makes use of the following software/libraries/plugins
coachtutorial_page1_step1_msg: Select the medicine that to be reminded to take
coachtutorial_page1_step2_msg: You will see the medicine name here after selected
coachtutorial_page1_step2_msg2: You can also click here to add the medicine name you want
coachtutorial_page1_step3_msg:
After adding medicine name
Click 'Next' to continue ->
coachtutorial_page2_step1_msg: Click here to set the alarm time
coachtutorial_page2_step1a_msg: A time selector will be popped out
coachtutorial_page2_step1b_msg:
Pull the slider to left/right to adjust time
Click 'Confirm' to set the time
coachtutorial_page2_step1b2_msg:
Move up or down to adjust time
Click 'Confirm' to set the time
coachtutorial_page2_step1_msg2:
If you want to set more time,
click '+' or just ignore is fine
coachtutorial_page2_step2_msg: Default setting the alarm repeat every day. If you don't want, just click to turn it off
coachtutorial_page2_step3_msg:
After setting alarm
Click 'Next' to continue ->
coachtutorial_page3_step2_msg:
After confirm the details
Click 'Next' to save ->
